name: Alexodite Mafia
description:
If Button Does Not Work, Click This

*Warning: This game contains blood, criminal themes, and involvement in drugs. All content in game is for entertainment only, do not replicate in real life*

Welcome to Alexodite, a city of crime, cash, and craze! Build your own crime operation, do crimes, improve your empire, join families to interact with, earn money, generate meth, upgrade your facilities, hire troops, fight other players, and so much more! Each and every player is valued by our staff, and we add upgrades once we get enough support and revenue! Join our empire today!

With a rather smooth graphic design, Alexodite provides satisfaction to those action-loving gamers! Lots of features to use and more to come!
